title: About bronze players posting about balance
body:
Just i want to say thank you for the people who try to help them with builds, counters and stuff,instead of making jokes about beeing bronze and wrong builds and offensive posts.

Remember that we all started with no knowledge of the game.  And the game is becoming more and more complicated

replies.body:
There are two types of Bronze threads on this board

1) Can someone offer me advice? I'm struggling with X, Y, Z.

2) 800 GAMES IN BRONZE! THIS IS BULLSHIT TEAM ALWAYS FEEDS! I'M A **GOD** THOUGH. X, Y, Z IS BROKEN ANYONE WHO DISAGREES IS GARBAGE BECAUSE I'M A GOD OF LOL
3: I do fairly well in Normals, but for some reason, I can't win in Ranked.
4: Jokes on you, I'm the troll
5: my {{champion:67}} mechanics are on point i lose because i get shitty supports who dont know how to play! i max my q first, i shoot instantly out of ult q like i should!

6: MY {{champion:92}} {{item:3001}} {{item:3027}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3165}} {{item:3135}} {{item:3285}} 
I DON'T UNDERSTAND WHAT I'M DOING WRONG, I'M GETTING SO MUCH ABILITY POWER, WHY DO MY ABILITIES DO NO DAMAGE?!!!!!1!
7: Somebody told me to get builds from this really reliable website called Ultimate Bravery, but so far it hasn't changed much. It must be me doing something wrong, please help!
8: MY CHAMP POOL AINT BIG ENOUGH PLS HALP ;__;
9: bronze support main! I REGRET NOTHING

11: {{champion:36}} IM NOT GOING TANK IM GOING OP NEW BUILD I MADE UP YESTERDAY

20 minutes later

{{champion:36}}  FFS NO JUNGLE GANKS

On the note of Dr. Mundo and low elo...

>"/all OMG report mundo!! ulted himself instead of me!"
13 . I skipped 12
Lmao best one
12: Enemy Riven is hacking.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Boltrix,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Mm05WZBd,comment-id=00060000000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-31T01:41:27.556+0000)
>
> 6: MY {{champion:92}} {{item:3001}} {{item:3027}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3165}} {{item:3135}} {{item:3285}} 
> I DON'T UNDERSTAND WHAT I'M DOING WRONG, I'M GETTING SO MUCH ABILITY POWER, WHY DO MY ABILITIES DO NO DAMAGE?!!!!!1!

But...literally no bronze players that aren't trolling are this bad lul

(i got the joke)

Man you should definitely watch Tricks bronze subwars. 
Or kashaways (dunno how he is written) bronze videos and look at their builds sometimes.
kshaway's wood division adventures

> [{quoted}](name=Battlecast Janna,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Mm05WZBd,comment-id=00060000000000000000000100010000,timestamp=2016-10-31T16:52:21.006+0000)
>
> kshaway's wood division adventures

Always makes me feel a bit better about myself as a player.
Sorry for being dumb right now, but whats wrong with maxing Q? If your enemy botlane doesnt have something tanky, wouldnt the higher burst damage be better than maxing the silver bolts?

Vayne by herself is still irrelevant til late. So, you are free usually free to max Q or W first b/c by the time they are both maxed you'll have some items and relevance.

For example, if you have kill pressure with your support; Q max could help you secure kill. 

Most of the time, Vayne is usually in a sustain/survive lane so it honestly doesn't matter. I still like W max for the proc burst you can get with a tumble thrown in.

lots of factors go into it, i also wouldnt say its higher burst, but more efficient poke in lanes you feel you simply cant win trades.

but build matters a lot as well.

You actually start and max Q first since W gets better later in the game, and Q provides better trades and safety.

And if you have Shiv and if your positioning allows it, Q out of ult is the most viable way of dealing a lot of damage.

What are you trying to mock there?

you added contingencies to every point you tried to make.
you lose by default.
Okay
that's because in norms people practice and troll... once in ranked, people play serious... I feel sorry for you if you thought norms where for serious plays

<- The joke
Your head.

1) Makes me much more inclined to help, if the subject is anything I know something about.

2) I barely read the first line before I dismiss it out of hand and downvote before I close the tab.
my favorite is "I don't belong in bronze" or "sightstones are useless"
There's an "or" in there? I thought it was usually an "and".

I am Bronze and will probably be Bronze forever because I literally do not play Ranked, I do my placements every season and just stop caring because the added pressure is not fun for me

But I can tell you anything you need to know about Teemo
QUICK, WHAT DO YOU YOU DO AGAINST AN AGGRO AF PANTHEON WHO JUST HIT LVL 2?!

Let him push towards you and stay away, hopefully your jungler has a brain. Missing CS is better than feeding the pantheon! You could bring exhaust, also rush Frozen Mallet + Ninja Tabi (if maxing E) or you could try maxing Q to poke harass him, your Q does massive damage and out-ranges his W, but beware the flash still.

I read up on pantheon and the idea is that he wants to Q-W-auto combo you at level 2, then all in and kill you at lvl 3 with rank 2 Q
:v honestly, I hate Panth lol.
MY MAN {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Remember Bronze and Silver players represent the majority of players playing lol therefore we should be able to have a valid word about how we feel about the game we love.  I play just as much as any gold player the only difference is that I don't have the skill to or the pc that would allow me to reach that level after two years.  Our ideas are just as valid as any player of the highest level.  

I used to main Nidalee in Season 5 and I crushed with her hard.  And then she was nerfed because challenger level players were unbeatable with her.  And even with all the NIdalee nerfs players like Rush and Peanut are still unbeatable with her.  

Yet I can barely clear the jungle to get to lvl 4 with her now.

I try to skim the "new" tab but honestly I get frustrated with the amount of posts that say things like:

gnar op tower lvl 7 so i lost when he mallat fight

Like, I'll help you if I can just understand what the fuck you are trying to get help with xD

Like this, lol: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/o%%%lnNi-nerf-fast-rat

To be fair, I found it pretty funny.

>Remember that we all started with no knowledge of the game. 

The difference is that a great deal of bronzies remain bronze because they argue.

When I was bronze I remained quiet and tried to understand the game, listening to those that had more experience and skill than I did.... naturally I very quickly began to rise to the top 1% of the population precisely because I didn't belong in bronze. Bronze players aren't "Starting out" either.... they have to get to level 30 and do placement matches.

Basically most bronzies are there because they belong there, not because they're new.
Top 1% ? Ur elo? :) or ur rank whatever :) i'm just curious :)

> [{quoted}](name=EricDagher,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Mm05WZBd,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2016-10-30T21:23:06.403+0000)
>
> Top 1% ? Ur elo? :) or ur rank whatever :) i'm just curious :)

He made it back to d5 about a month ago.

And me who was happy a challenger posted here :(
Disappointed
challenger/master are .01% not 1%

U said "when i was bronze"
So considering what u where saying, you belong to bronze, wait, u climbed, i was bronze, i belong to bronze, but wait i climbed, many people started bronze, but wait, they climbed. And now are silver, gold, plat!
Dude! Everyone can climb, but some needs more time than others. who are you to judge them if they can get out of bronze or not.

> [{quoted}](name=q fizz p,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Mm05WZBd,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2016-10-30T20:21:22.625+0000)
>
> U said "when i was bronze"
> So considering what u where saying, you belong to bronze, wait, u climbed, i was bronze, i belong to bronze, but wait i climbed, many people started bronze, but wait, they climbed. And now are silver, gold, plat!
> Dude! Everyone can climb, but some needs more time than others. who are you to judge them if they can get out of bronze or not.

It's a matter of knowledge and experience that leads to such a climb. A cup that is full can receive no more tea. Empty your cup, or your climb can never begin.
Good advice, though it has the distinct flavor of fortune cookie. :P

> [{quoted}](name=TyrekGoldenspear,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Mm05WZBd,comment-id=0001000100010000,timestamp=2016-10-30T20:38:11.798+0000)
>
> Good advice, though it has the distinct flavor of fortune cookie. :P

It's supposed to be bland and factual. There's usually very little flash or glamour when it comes to the truth.
XD. I meant it sounds like something you would find in a fortune cookie lol.

> [{quoted}](name=TyrekGoldenspear,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Mm05WZBd,comment-id=000100010001000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-30T20:45:49.941+0000)
>
> XD. I meant it sounds like something you would find in a fortune cookie lol.

I'm aware.

=P
